results.name: a(n) = denominator of c(n) = if n=1 then 1 else if n < 3*2^[Log2(n)-1] then (c([n/2])+c([(n+1)/2]))/2 else c(n-2^[Log2(n)])+1;.

see A140129 for further comments and examples.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8191
